person.persName: Alexander Boyd (Hancock County, KY, merchant saloon owner & home guard soldier)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, merchant, soldier, and saloon owner. Georgia native. Married to Belle Boyd. Father of Henry Boyd, Elizabeth Boyd, George Boyd, Buckner Boyd, Catherine Boyd, and Frank Boyd. Merchant in Hancock County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Hancock County in 1860. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard in June 1861.
